pageProps.contentHtml:
While studying for the analysis qualifying exam, I typed up solutions for the problems I worked on. Most solutions are taken from the solutions maintained by Adam Lott (see below), but rewritten into my own words. Towards the end, I began writing more original solutions.

I passed with the Spring 2021 exam.

Collaborators

  • Erin George
  • James Chapman
  • Jianming Wang
  • Kyle Gettig
  • Raymond Chu

Resources

  • Chu, R., Analysis Qualifying Exam Solutions
  • Fremlin, D., Measure Theory
  • Hayes, B., Analysis Qual Solutions
  • Johnsrude, B., UCLA Analysis Qualifying Exam Solutions
  • Lott, A., UCLA Analysis Qualifying Exam Solutions
  • Rudin, W., Real and Complex Analysis
  • Folland, G., Real Analysis: Modern Techniques and Their Applications
